main event: A bright colored sphere with rays was observed flying slowly from the horizon to overhead in Ashland, Kentucky on December 6, 1963.
interesting points: The object moved at an estimated speed of 750-1500 MPH.
The object emitted a loud noise.
The object was estimated to be around 30 feet in diameter.
The witness was asked to draw a diagram showing the object's path and motion.
This sighting was reported to the Air Force on December 29, 1963.
sighted object: a bright colored sphere with rays
witnesses: a witness on the Carroll Farm
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph
